hymn.title: IMI MURI IZWI
hymn.subtitle: O Bright, Eternal One
lyrics:
1. Imi muri izwi 
Rakasika mwenje
Nayo mvonga mvonga
Ikave rufaro.

2. Nomukutambudzwa,
Makamutsurudza
Mwoyo yavatendi,
Vakakushumirai.

3. Izwi rakavanda,
Tokuona zvino
Napatinofamba,
Kristu, ari pano.

4. Togara maari,
Iye wokudenga;
Ngatimutsvagei,
Dakara tamuda.

5. O, Ishe, mupenyu,
Mwoyo yodudzira
Runako rwenyu, ‘She,
Nokubwinya kwenyu.
hymn.author: Catherine Baird (1896-1984)

title: IMI MURI RUDEKARO
subtitle: Thou Hidden Source of Calm Repose

lyrics: 1. Imi muri rudekaro Rwakavanzika murudo; Chipotero kuvavengi Ndofadzwa kana muneni. Muzvitadzo, mukunyadzwa, Ndovanzwa nemi, jesu, ‘She.
2. Zita renyu, ruponiso, Rondifadza pakudenga; Rounza simba, rugare, Norudo rusingapere; Muzita renyu ndowana Kuregererwa, noutsvene.
3. Jesu muri zvose zvangu Pazororo, mukurwadzawa, Murapi wemwoyo wangu; Mukurwa, ndichazorodzwa Mondifadza mberi kwemhandu, Ndowana korona yangu.
4. Mukushaya, mondigutsa, Muutera, mopa simba; Ndosunungurwa majoto, Mwenje, mberi kwomuvengi; Ndichadana, mogadzira Upenyu hwangu kudenga.
hymn.author: Charles Wesley (1707-88)

lyrics: 1. Mwari Muchenjeri, hamuonekwi Makavanzwa kwatiri muchiedza, Makaropafadzwa Dombo rekare, samasimba, M’kundi, tokurumbidza.
2. Makanyararisa kunge chiedza, Hamuperi, munotonga nesimba; Ndurano yenyu, makomo marefu, Pam’soro pamakore ane rudo.
3. Munopa upenyu kuna zvose; Muri mupenyu hwezvinhu zvose; Todenhera semashizha emiti; Tofa topera,asi hamusanduke.
4. Baba wokubwinya, muri chiedza Ngirozi dzokudza, dzovanza zviso; Tokukudzai, tiyamurei kuona Chiedza chitsvene chinokuvanzai.
hymn.author: Walter Chalmers Smith (1824-1908)

lyrics: 1. Mwari ngaakudzwe nebasa rake, Norudo wakatipa mwana wake, Wakafira kudzikinura zvivi, Nokuzarura suo reupenyu.
Kudza ;She! Kudza ‘She! Nyika ngaimunzwe; Kudza ;She! Kudza ‘She! Vanhu ngavafare; Uyai kuna Baba nokuna Jesu, Kudzai nezvakaitirwa isu.
2. Ruregerero rutsvene rweropa, Kumutendi chivimbiso chaMwari. Mutadzi mukuru akangotenda, Owana ruregerero rwaJesu.
3. Wakatidzidzisa zvinhu zvikuru Norufaro rwedu muna Jesu, ‘She, Rufaro rwedu ruchave rukuru, Kana toona Jesu mumakore.
1. Mwari Samasimba, Iye rumbo rwedu; Naye tichakunda Vavengi vakuru. Satani anorwa nhando, Nokuti Mwari NdiMambo.
2. Ishe bako redu Achazongodaro; Wakamisa isu Norwake rubato. Vavengi vanorwa nhando, Nokuti Mwari ndiMambo.
3. Jehovah Mufudzi, Anoziva zvose; Isu tiri hwai Tichafudzwa naye. Chivi norufu inhando, Nokuti Mwari ndiMambo.
4. Mwari baba wedu, Tiri vana vake; Tichazongodaro, Haangatisiye. Masimba ose inhando, Nokuti Mwari ndiMambo.

title: MWARI WAMARUDZI OSE
subtitle: O Thou God Of Every Nation

lyrics: 1. Mwari wamarudzi ose, Zvino tikomborerei; Mumwoyo tigadzirire, Uye moto wenyu; Ropafadzai Hondo yedu, Tizadzei namasimba.
2. Tizadzei noMweya M’tsvene, Mauto ashambidzwe; Nemi satani aparadzwe, Nenyika iponiswe; Ropafadzwai Hondo yedu, Titumei kwamunoda.
3. Utsvene hwenyu, tipei, Ngatizadzwe nesimba; Hondo yedu ngaitende, Nom’ towo wokukunda; Ropafadzai Hondo yedu, Muve rudziviriro.
4. Ropafadzai vafundisi, Vatungamiri vose; Ropafadzaiwo vadzoki, Mauto edu ose, Ropafadzai Hondo yedu Matama tiparidze.
hymn.author: William James Pearson (1832-92)

title: MWARI WEDENGA NAPASI
subtitle: O Lord Of Heaven And Earth

lyrics: 1. Mwari wedenga napasi, Ngakuve norurumbidzo; Toratidza rudo sei: Mupi wazvose.
2. Runyararo rwemudzimba Namakomborero ose; Tinotenda, tokurumbidzai; Mupi wazvose.
3. Makapira Mwana wenyu, Kunesu tose vepasi; Mwana wenyu mumwechete: Makapa zvose.
4. Munopa Mweya Mutsvene, Mweya worudo nesimba; Nengoni dzakawandisa, Nokwatiriwo.
5. Mukununurwa muzvivi, Ndiyo nzira youdenga; Baba varumbidzwe zvino; Mupi wazvose.
hymn.author: Christopher Wordsworth (1807-85)

title: MWARI WEDU MUDZIVIRIRI
subtitle: A Mighty Fortress Is Our Lord

lyrics: 1. Mwari wedu mudziviriri, Rusvingo rusingakundwe; Muyamuri mumirove Yedambudzo roupenyu. Sezvo mhandu yedu Satani aripo, Ane simba guru, Noruvengo rwake, Haana wezera pasi.
2. Kuvimba neredu simba Kunotiita tikundwe, Dai tisina M’ponisi Watakapiwa naMwari, Wobvunza, ndiani? Ndiye Jesu Kristu; Ishe wesabata, Asingapinduke, Achakunda mukurwa.
3. Nyangwe kune madhimoni Anoda kutinyengera; Hatitye, Mwari anoda Tikunde neidi rake. Muchinda werima Hatimudederi, Ane hasha nhando, Hona! achakundwa. Izwi duku romukunda
4. Izwi rine simba chose, Kwete, haringambomiswa. Mweya, nezvipo ndezvedu Zviri kurutivi rwedu. Upfumi nehama, Upenyu hwopera, Vangatiuraye; Chokwadi chomira, Umambo hwake narinhi.
hymn.author: Martin Luther (1483-1545), trs Frederick Henry Hedge (1805-90)

title: MWEYA WANGU, RUMBIDZA ‘SHE
english_title: Praise My Soul The King of Heaven
tune: Praise My Soul The King of Heaven, 422

lyrics: Mweya wangu, rumbidza ‘She Pasi petsoka dzake; Wanunurwa, waponiswa, Chiimba mbiri yake; Murumbidze! Murumbidze! Kudza ‘She asingafe.
Mukudze nengoni dzake Kune vari munhamo, woranga, wovaponisa, Vose vakarasika; Murumbidze!Murumbidze! Mwari anovimbika.
Sababa wotichengeta, Kana tisina simba; Wochengeta mumaoko, Torwirwa kuvavengi, Murumbidze! Murumbidze! Nengoni dzoyerera.
Ngirozi dzomurumbidza, Dzotarisana naye, Zuva, mwedzi, zvonamata Zvigereko kudenga; Murumbidze! Murumbidze! Rumbidzai Wenyasha.

author: Henry Francis Lyte (1793-1857)

title: NAMATAI MAMBO ANORUBWINYO
english_title: O Worship The King, All Glorious

lyrics: Namatai Mambo anorubwinyo; Imbai nesimba rudo rwakwe; Iye mudzviviriri nenhowo yedu, Agere muutsvene hune mbiri.
Imbai zvesimba nengoni dzake, Ane nguvo, chiedza chedenga, Kutsamwa kwake, ‘She, kunotinhira, Nzira yake ine rima padutu.
Nyika izere nezvishamiso, Nesimba rake, ‘She, richigere, Rakadaro risingasandurwe, Zve, wakarikomberedza negungwa.
Ruchengeto rwake rwakakosha, Rwuri mumhepo, nomuchiedza; Rwobva mugomo rwopinda mubani, Rwuri m ‘dova nemvura inonaya.
Vana venyika vasina simba, Maari tinoisa ruvimbo, Tsitsi nomutsa wake hazvigume, Musiki, mudzikinuri, nehama.
Samasimba, rudo rwakadzama, Ngirozi dzichiimba kudenga; Zvisikwa zvenyika zvisina simba, Norukudzo zvichakuimbirawo.

author: Robert Grant (1779-1839)

title: NGAARUMBIDZWE WEDENGA
english_title: Praise To The Holiest In The Height

lyrics: Ngaarumbidzwe wedenga Napasi pakudze, Namazwi ake matsvene, Nenzira dzeidi.
Ungwaru hwaMwari wedu Hunokunda hwose; Kritsu wakauya kuti Azotinunura.
Adhamu wakakundika Munyama neropa, Asi rudo rwake Mwari, Rwakakunda zvose.
Ngaarumbidzwe wedenga, Napasi pakudze; Namazwi ake matsvene, Nenzira dzeidi.

author: John Henry Newman (1821-77)
